SELECT ST.CODE_NAME AS progressCd, PT.CODE_NAME AS pcType, HD.PR_NUM AS prNum, HD.REQ_USER_ID AS reqUserId, HD.DEPT_CD AS deptNm, DT.UNIT_CD AS unitCd, DT.REG_DATE AS regDate, DT.ITEM_CD AS itemCd, DT.ITEM_DESC AS itemDesc, DT.PR_QT AS prQt, DT.UNIT_PRC AS unitPrc, DT.PR_AMT AS prAmt, DT.DELY_DATE AS delyDate from PRDT DT JOIN PRHD HD ON DT.PR_NUM = HD.PR_NUM
LEFT JOIN CODD ST ON ST.CODE_GROUP = 'PROGRESS_CD' AND ST.CODE = HD.PROGRESS_CD AND ST.USE_YN = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN CODD PT ON PT.CODE_GROUP = 'PC_TYPE' AND PT.CODE = HD.PC_TYPE AND PT.USE_YN = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN BY_USER U ON HD.REQ_USER_ID = U.USER_ID
WHERE HD.DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND DT.DEL_FLAG = 'N'
ORDER BY HD.PR_NUM DESC
